report

Class ReportController

  • java.lang.Object
    • report.ReportController

  • public class ReportController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for choosing report the user wants to view or if the BM is connected to upload a PDF report Controls reportsScreen.fxml Ceo has options monthly report , quarter report,Branch manger quarterly reports BM has options MonthlyReports Upload Reports
    Since:
    01.01.2022
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Daniel Aibinder

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private javafx.scene.control.Button UploadReportsBtn
      uploadReportsBtn button to upload a pdf report
      private javafx.scene.control.Button viewBranchPdfReport
      viewBranchPdfReport button to view the pdf report branch manager sent
      private javafx.scene.control.Button viewQuarterIncome
      viewQuarterIncome button to go to quarterlyIncome
      private javafx.scene.control.Button viewReportButton
      viewReportButton button to go to monthly reports

      ReportController() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) void goToChooseQuarterAndBranch(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      loads QuarterlyHistogramScreen.fxml on pressing view quarterly report button
      (package private) void goToCreateReports(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Activates on pressing upload report button opens a file chooser for user where he can select a pdf to upload
      (package private) void goToViewReports(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Activates on pressing monthly reports button opens the ViewReports.fxml page
      void initialize()
      initializes our controller to hide and show buttons according to user type CEO doesnt see view uploads BM only sees UploadReports and View reports button
      (package private) void ViewPdf(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      loads ViewPdfScreen on pressing view quarterly BM reports button loads the pdf the BM has uploaded
